description:
This downloadable content includes:
• The Brawltimore Razors Team – led by running and passing sensation, Quarterback Lamaul Jackhammer who has his sights set on winning the Mayhem Bowl. The Razors are one of the MFL’s most exciting teams, with a stout defense and a bruising running game, they unleash pain and punishment on every play.
• B&D Spank Stadium. This ghoulish arena includes landmines, buzz-saws and an animating guillotine goal post.
• "Rise Up" by Bad Blood (Razors home musical theme).
name: Brawltimore Razors
